changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."address" ( "address_id" BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, "customer_id" BIGINT NOT NULL, "street" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "city" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "state" VARCHAR(255), "postal_code" VARCHAR(20), "country" VARCHAR(255), "is_primary" BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE );

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."users" ( "customer_id" BIGINT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "username" VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, "email" VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, "primary_address_id" BIGINT );

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."authentication" ( "customer_id" BIGINT NOT NULL, "password_hash" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "salt" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "last_login" TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, "failed_attempts" INTEGER DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, "locked_until" TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE, "jwt_token" VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT authentication_pkey PRIMARY KEY ("customer_id") );

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE public."address" ADD CONSTRAINT fk_customer FOREIGN KEY ("customer_id") REFERENCES public.users ("customer_id") ON DELETE CASCADE;

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE public."users" ADD CONSTRAINT fk_primary_address FOREIGN KEY ("primary_address_id") REFERENCES public.address ("address_id") ON DELETE SET NULL;

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS users_customer_id_idx ON public.users("customer_id");

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS address_customer_id_idx ON public.address("customer_id");

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS address_is_primary_idx ON public.address("is_primary");

changeSet.author: castiel
changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS authentication_customer_id_idx ON public.authentication("customer_id");
